description:
Non material amendment to planning consent ref: P2015/2913/FUL dated 19/02/2016 : (The demolition of the existing buildings on the southern part of the Former Ashmount School site and the erection of 46 residential units in three blocks with associated landscaping).

The amendment seeks to alter Block A1 by removing 2 balconies and Block B1 by changing the number, position and orientation of windows on the southern elevation to reduce the potential for overlooking.  Additionally amendments are proposed to the approved layout and configuration of flats (including balcony positions) at the first and second floor so that they have a northern outlook, to reduce the potential for overlooking of existing properties to the south.
site_name: Electricity Sub Station At Ashmount Road School Ashmount Road Primary School
